projectDevinnet: As a front-end developer at Devinnet, I was tasked with creating the new web page. I played a role in every step of the process. The design and layout of the site are my creation, and I implemented them using Webflow.
projectFloaBank: I contributed to the update of FLOA Bank's blog by working in a team with other developers. In close collaboration with the designer, I brought her vision to life using the provided templates. My role was to implement this design using Joomla.
projectAssisto: In collaboration with a designer, I fully developed a showcase website for the company Assisto. My role was to create the site using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also ensured performance optimization and adaptability of the site on various devices.
projectAtoukids: Atoukids is a personal project developed in desktop version only. My main focus was on implementing the professional search function by adding parameters in the URL and allowing navigation to their profiles. I used react-router-dom for this implementation.
projectEpikEco: As a member of a team of 4 developers, I participated in the creation of an ecological game. My main role was to develop the front-end. I contributed to the implementation of challenge creation, game launch, friend invitations, score visualization, etc.
projectFloaPay: I improved the blog section of the FLOA Pay website by collaborating with a team of developers, materializing the designers' vision using provided templates. I enriched the content, created new pages, and ensured optimal adaptability in multiple languages.
projectShop: Shop. is a personal project. I created a dynamic e-commerce site using Node.js and React, which I then deployed on the Heroku platform. I integrated Stripe for payment processing and enhanced the user experience by allowing clothing categorization by color and size.
projectFootStats: Footstats is a personal project built with React Native. Users are prompted to choose a championship and then a club. The data is then filtered to display the active clubs of the selected championship. Users can select players, filter them by name or position, and sort them by rating or position.
projectGovernement: I contributed to the State's DSFR by designing a presentation page for the various components. I worked closely with the development team to identify and resolve bugs, while also proposing essential improvements.
projectLaTour: In collaboration with a designer, I developed a page for La Tour Hospital. My role was to create this page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I integrated animations, ensuring performance optimization and the site's adaptability for different devices.
